    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Enigma's Knowledge](/Feats.aspx?ID=4618) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=546" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 106 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Loremaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=65) (Level 14)

**Prerequisites**
[Assured Knowledge](/Feats.aspx?ID=4596)

</column>

---

Your muse whispers knowledge to you at all the right times. You gain the benefits of the [Automatic Knowledge](/Feats.aspx?ID=5122) skill feat with any skill you can use to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=2367). As per the special clause in the Automatic Knowledge feat, you can still only use Automatic Knowledge once per round.
